column1: Albignasego is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Padua in the Italian region Veneto
column2: located about 35 kilometres (22 mi) west of Venice and about 7 kilometres (4.3 mi) south of Padua. As of 01/01/2014
column3: it had a population of 24.951 inhabitants and an area of 21.0 square kilometres (8.1 sq mi).The municipality of Albignasego contains the main village and frazioni (hamlets) Carpanedo

column1: Albignasego borders the following municipalities: Abano Terme
Among the churches in town is San Tommaso Apostolo.
